title: Sinha and Eggs
text: Sinha is a naughty kid, who always irritates Shukla with his activities. One day Sinha bought some eggs, but indulged in his pranks, forgets them in Shukla's room. Shukla being a considerate friend wanted to teach Sinha a lesson. He puts a condition in front of Sinha, he will give him a number and Sinha has to tell if it has an "Odd" number of factors. If Sinha answers the questions correctly, he shall return the eggs. Since, Sinha can't focus on the problem due to his mischievous nature, he asks you to help him.InputYou are given a number 't' in first  line depicting number of test cases. The next n lines contain a number 'n' each.Input Constraints:1 ≤ T ≤ 1000001 ≤ N ≤ 1011OutputYou have to print "YES" if the number 'n' has an odd number of factors, else print "NO".ExampleInput:31046Output:NOYESNO
